10.eng-name: The Book of Leading the Prayer (Al-Imamah)

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Al-Aswad and 'Alqamah said:"We entered upon 'Abdullah at midday and he said: 'There will be rulers who would be distracted from praying on time, so pray on time.' Then he stood up and prayed between him and I, and said: 'This is what I saw the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) do

chapter.ara-name: باب مَوْقِفِ الإِمَامِ إِذَا كَانُوا ثَلاَثَةً وَالاِخْتِلاَفِ فِي ذَلِكَ
chapter.eng-name: Where the Imam should stand when there are three, and the discrepancy regarding that
